entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -1.8°C

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 12 March 2023
